actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the black lung benefits provision of the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 to provide benefits for widows and dependents of miners who die after having served more than 25 years in coal mines.

summary.text: Provides benefits under the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act for widows and dependents of miners who die after having served more than twenty-five years in coal mines.

titles.title: A bill to amend the black lung benefits provision of the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 to provide benefits for widows and dependents of miners who die after having served more than 25 years in coal mines.
